See also: stelle and stèlle

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Back-formation from stellen, verb.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈʃtɛlə/
  • Rhymes: -ɛlə
  • Audio
    		(file)
  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Stelle f (genitive Stelle, plural Stellen)

  1. place, stead, location, position, lieu
  2. position (as a job), employment
  3. digit, decimal place

Declension[edit]

Declension of Stelle
singularplural
indef.def.noundef.noun
nominativeeinedieStelledieStellen
genitiveeinerderStellederStellen
dativeeinerderStelledenStellen
accusativeeinedieStelledieStellen
